attributes.action: Assist with house purchases, credit worthiness, reduce the impact of a poor credit file
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that the government assist in providing credit worthiness to mortgage companies to allow first time buyers to be able to purchase with a highly inflated deposit.
We request that there be a scheme for bad credit people to allow a secured loan on a property that is undersigned by the local council and government.
We feel this would enable first time buyers to purchase a property with a reasonable deposit and help correct a receeding market.
We request that people damaged by relationship splits, and/or CCJ`s be considered for housing schemes.
We also petition for credit files to have a life of 3 years not 6 years to help people who may have bad credit to be able to become self supportive in a shorter time, 6 years gives people no hope 3 years would give hope to many many people.
